message: I propose dividing the money equally, with you receiving $400000 and me receiving $600000.

I propose we split the money 60/40 in my favor.  This seems fair, considering you took the lion's share in the last round. Let's get this done quickly before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Considering the inflation, I propose we divide the money as follows: you receive $475000 and I receive $525000. This takes into account the decrease in value over the previous rounds.
